objects.text:
• Multiple Drying Cycles
• Energy-Efficient Operation
• Moisture Sensing Technology
• Large Capacity Drum

INSIGNIA™ HIGH-EFFICIENCY
DIGITAL FRONT LOAD DRYER

product_details.name: Insignia™ High-Efficiency Digital Front Load Dryer - Modern Laundry Solution
product_details.description:
• Sleek white design with modern digital display and intuitive controls
• Multiple drying cycles including Normal, Heavy Duty, Delicates, and Quick Dry
• Large capacity drum with spacious interior for family-sized loads
• LED digital display shows remaining time and cycle status
• Easy-to-use control dial with multiple temperature settings
• Energy-efficient operation to help reduce utility costs
• Convenient maintenance access panel for easy cleaning and service
• Ventilation system with proper airflow management
• Durable construction with premium finish
• Compact yet powerful design perfect for apartments and homes
• Clear viewing window to monitor drying progress
• Advanced moisture sensing technology for optimal drying results

banner_details:
This square promotional banner is designed using a quadrant layout with a modern and clean aesthetic, ideal for showcasing home appliances. It features a bold and eye-catching headline (`heading`) on the top-left quadrant over a steel-blue background, complemented by a sleek tagline (`tagline`) beneath it in a lighter grey-blue font. Just below, a bulleted list (`features`) showcases four key features in white, enhancing readability against the blue grid pattern. The top-right section features a product image (`product_image`), with the product title (`product_name`) below it. The bottom-right quadrant highlights a large price tag (`price`) centered over a subtle circular motif, accompanied by a prominent rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) labeled with text (`cta`).

**Color Palette:**
- Steel Blue: `#4682B4`
- Midnight Blue: `#3A6A9B`
- Light Gray: `#E5E5E5`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Dark Gray Text: `#333333`
- CTA Button Blue: `#4682B4`
product_color: The product image presents a sleek and modern washing machine featuring a minimalist color palette dominated by bright white (#FFFFFF), matte black (#1A1A1A), and steel gray (#4F4F4F). The machine’s body is primarily a clean white, providing a crisp and premium look. The door and digital panel frame are deep black, creating strong contrast and drawing attention to the functional elements. Subtle hints of color on the control dial—blue (#1E90FF), red (#FF4500), and light gray (#D3D3D3)—inject vibrancy while guiding user interaction. These carefully blended yet contrasted colors balance elegance and clarity, making this palette ideal for a clean, tech-focused advertisement banner.
